snippet: The 2012 Ford Focus Electric, the first all-electric car from a Detroit automaker in the 21st century, has the road manners of a gasoline car and looks nearly identical to the regular Focus.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2012 Ford Focus Electric vehicle.
lead_paragraph: The 2012 Ford Focus Electric, the first all-electric car from a Detroit automaker in the 21st century, has the road manners of a gasoline car and looks nearly identical to the regular Focus.

headline.main: The Battery-Driven Car Just Got a Lot More Normal
headline.print_headline: The Battery-Driven Car Just Got a Lot More Normal
headline.content_kicker: Behind the Wheel | 2012 Ford Focus Electric
